pkgmetadata.longdescription: Next Generation Clustered Heat Maps // Next-Generation Clustered Heat Maps (NG-CHMs) allow for dynamic exploration of heat map data in a web browser. 'NGCHM' allows users to create both stand-alone HTML files containing a Next-Generation Clustered Heat Map, and .ngchm files to view in the NG-CHM viewer. See Ryan MC, Stucky M, et al (2020) doi:10.12688/f1000research.20590.2 for more details.
